pullrequest.title: update TurtleBot3 models and add TurtleBot3 House

content.raw: In general it's good to have these models more easily accessible. Will these models be useful without the ROS packages which include the drivers and plugins to operate them? Will there be tutorials for using them standalone? And looking forward at potential evolutions of the designs that might need to be versioned between rosdistros that would make this upstream hosting more challenging rather than continuing to distribute the models through their ROS packages where they can follow similar versioning release cycles?
content.html: In general it's good to have these models more easily accessible. Will these models be useful without the ROS packages which include the drivers and plugins to operate them? Will there be tutorials for using them standalone? And looking forward at potential evolutions of the designs that might need to be versioned between rosdistros that would make this upstream hosting more challenging rather than continuing to distribute the models through their ROS packages where they can follow similar versioning release cycles?
